name: Crispy Egg Cheese Toast

images.alt: A freshly baked crispy egg and cheese toast in the oven, featuring two slices of toasted bread with a slice of ham and melted cheese in between, topped with a sunny side up egg and surrounded by shredded mozzarella cheese

ingredients.name: Mayonnaise or garlic, butter and honey

instructions: Lay sliced cheese and ham on first piece of bread.
Make an indentation in the second piece of bread with a glass or bowl with round bottom and place on top of the slice with ham and cheese.
Cover the top of the slice of bread with the indentation with the mayonnaise or garlic, butter and honey.
Crack an egg in the indentation and season with salt and pepper.
Bake the sandwich in the oven.
